text: Le dernier milliardaire (English title: The Last Billionaire) is a 1934 French comedy film directed by René Clair and starring Max Dearly, Marthe Mellot and Renée Saint-Cyr.BFI.org The film is based on a fictional small European kingdom which is on the verge of going broke. ==Cast== * Max Dearly - Banco * Marthe Mellot - Queen of Casinario * Renée Saint-Cyr - Princess Isabelle * Sinoël - Prime Minister * Charles Redgie - Crown Prince Nicolas * Marcel Carpentier - Detective Brown * Raymond Cordy - Valet * José Noguero - Bandleader ==References== ==External links== * Category:1935 films Category:French films Category:1935 comedy films Category:French-language films Category:French black-and-white films Category:Films directed by René Clair Category:French comedy films
title: The Last Billionaire
